installer.title: PY-SFC Demonstration
installer.description: Installer of a demonstration environment for the ILS PY-SFC package

panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for Demonstrating PY-SFC
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for demonstrating PY-SFC. This is a Python extension of the Inductive Automation SFC module. The installer installs the PY-SFC module and accompanying project and examlple classes. The table below compares the existing installation of this product, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation. Before continuing, please make sure that you have defined at least one tag provider and database connection. Additionally, the Ignition SFC module must be installed.

panel.title: Define tags provider and database connections
panel.preamble: Specify the database connection and DBMS-type that become the demonstration project defaults.

panel.title: Python Code for Py-SFC
panel.preamble: This page loads Python code that defines the custom SFC steps. The Python is stored outside of any project in the Ignition installation directory.

panel.title: Py-SFC Module
panel.preamble: This step installs modules necessary for PY-SFC.

panel.title: Install the PySfc Demonstration Project
panel.preamble: PySfc Sample is a main Ignition project. It holds a collection of use case descriptions and accompanying windows.

panel.title: Install SFC Charts in the Global Project
panel.preamble: This page handles installation of charts for various use cases. The charts are packaged as Ignition global projects. They completely replace any existing charts of the same name. Multiple chart hierarchies can be updated from this one page.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of ACE Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation of the PY-SFC Demonstration project is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: Newly created projects are installed disabled. They must be enabled before use.
Several modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
